hero.title: Home Cupping Services Number 1 in Egypt
hero.subtitle: We have been providing home cupping services across Egypt with the highest efficiency and the most affordable prices for over 3 years.

advSection.title: Why us?
advSection.expertDesc: Highly trained and certified professionals delivering exceptional care tailored to your needs.
advSection.schedulingDesc: Flexible appointments to fit your busy life, ensuring timely therapy.
advSection.comfortDesc: Receive quality therapy in the comfort of your home, creating a safe and relaxed environment.
advSection.careDesc: We bring professional therapy services to the comfort of your home, allowing you to receive the care you need without the hassle of travel. Our dedicated team of therapists tailors each session to your individual needs, ensuring a personalized approach to your well-being.
ul: Certified and trained medical personnel providing exceptional care to meet your unique needs.
Mishrat stands out with high-quality and efficient services.
We provide all possible means of comfort for our distinguished clients.

aboutUs.title: About Meshrat
aboutUs.content: Meshrat is Egypt's leading provider of at-home cupping services, known for its top-tier efficiency and competitive pricing for over three years. The center offers a range of services, including therapeutic cupping, at-home physical therapy, and recovery sessions. Meshrat is dedicated to delivering professional and convenient healthcare services at home, with 24/7 availability throughout Egypt.
